mapper.select: SELECT w.warehouseCode ,w.warehouseName ,w.category1 ,w.category2 ,w.`area` ,w.loaction ,w.outPlace ,w.currentWeight ,w.maxWeight ,IF(maxWeight>0, ROUND(100*w.currentWeight/w.maxWeight), -1) AS weightPer ,w.`status` ,w.regDate ,w.updateDate FROM k1_tb_warehouse_info AS w WHERE mainBusinessCode = #{mainBusinessCode};

SELECT w.warehouseCode ,w.warehouseName ,w.category1 ,w.category2 ,w.`area` ,w.loaction ,w.outPlace ,w.currentWeight ,w.maxWeight ,IF(maxWeight>0, ROUND(100*w.currentWeight/w.maxWeight), -1) AS weightPer ,w.`status` ,w.regDate ,w.updateDate FROM k1_tb_warehouse_info AS w WHERE w.warehouseCode = #{warehouseCode};
